metadata.name: Toad-nalisa
metadata.description: "Toad-nalisa" is a splendid blend of traditional art and modern meme culture, elegantly interweaving high and low forms of art. It takes the age-old question of Mona Lisa's smile, injects it with a RiBT of fun, and reimagines it through the lens of an irresistibly cute, yellow toad. This painting is, no doubt, an ode to all the amphibian lovers, art enthusiasts, and meme aficionados who appreciate pure simple beauty.
